Topic.Title: Whats that, looks like table tipping?

Posts.EditableText: No, it's just a table, turning round... on it's own! Alright, alright. Seriously, I've noticed some difference on the forum lately, and I can't help but put the carrot infront of the donkey (In other words, grabbing a certain individuals attention). "Oh my, another DavidW thread..." That's right folks. It's become a common curiousity, as to how many (Or more accurately, who?) people are actually sick of DavidW. What was once a petty, funny, and slightly humourous joke between myself and said idiot (Who seemed to replace the likes of ITID/ITIB oddly enough), has turned into a mass forum "war" (Shall we say?). Although I'm quite pleased that DavidW is now receiving what was once my end of the deal, although I was never particularly hated by anybody in the first place. It's quite sad, not only does he judge people from their internet character (Probably one of many different personalities you or others take on during internet sessions), but now he's lowered himself to the level where he will insult you because you're not using full, correct, and proper English grammar. I await his reply to this thread, I'm very eager to see if he can hold himself back from replying. Unfortunately, children don't build up will power until a later age, and some people just never do
Posts.HTML:
No, it's just a table, turning round... on it's own!

Alright, alright. Seriously, I've noticed some difference on the forum lately, and I can't help but put the carrot infront of the donkey (In other words, grabbing a certain individuals attention).

"Oh my, another DavidW thread..."

That's right folks. It's become a common curiousity, as to how many (Or more accurately, who?) people are actually sick of DavidW. What was once a petty, funny, and slightly humourous joke between myself and said idiot (Who seemed to replace the likes of ITID/ITIB oddly enough), has turned into a mass forum "war" (Shall we say?).

Although I'm quite pleased that DavidW is now receiving what was once my end of the deal, although I was never particularly hated by anybody in the first place.

It's quite sad, not only does he judge people from their internet character (Probably one of many different personalities you or others take on during internet sessions), but now he's lowered himself to the level where he will insult you because you're not using full, correct, and proper English grammar.

I await his reply to this thread, I'm very eager to see if he can hold himself back from replying. Unfortunately, children don't build up will power until a later age, and some people just never do

Posts.EditableText:
I think you'll find that I only raise the spelling and grammar issue when someone else makes a point of mentioning it, like CheerleaderChick saying that gamer_gurl didn't speak very good English in a post riddled with spelling mistakes. 

We all makes typos and grammatical errors from time to time, but if you're going to post messages on a forum that are full of spelling mistakes, you ought to have the decency not to criticise other people for making them.
Posts.HTML:
I think you'll find that I only raise the spelling and grammar issue when someone else makes a point of mentioning it, like CheerleaderChick saying that gamer_gurl didn't speak very good English in a post riddled with spelling mistakes.

We all makes typos and grammatical errors from time to time, but if you're going to post messages on a forum that are full of spelling mistakes, you ought to have the decency not to criticise other people for making them.

You were attacked mercilessly and you didn't deserve it. After looking at the forums for a bit I saw that you were attacked regularly by Davidw and his ... Dare I say minions? Yes, I think it's apro po. I really do. I posted recently a notable treatise on the antics of Davidw. It was locked ...and... I understand this action with all respect to Alex. I'm sure that Davidw will attack me for this post as he attacks me for every post. I am not sure how much more of his crap that I can take, honestly. I am not really well socialised. I relate to machines better than people. It's what I do. I've said this before. I could have and probably should have sent this as a PM but since it's all been out in the open all along I figured to just make it a post. Kindest regards, -OV
